# drawsBackground

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the cell draws its background.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var drawsBackground: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the cell draws its background.

## Configuring Appearance

- **backgroundColor**: The cell’s background color.
- **textColor**: The cell’s text color.
- **datePickerStyle**: The date picker style to use.
- **datePickerElements**: A bitmask that indicates which visual elements are shown by the date picker.
